Name: PLEXOS
Short Description: Integrated energy system optimization platform for electricity and multi-commodity markets. Supports long-term capacity expansion, production cost modeling, unit commitment, nodal and zonal dispatch, and co-optimization across multiple time horizons.
Primary Application: Integrated energy market simulation (Capacity Expansion + Production Cost)

Name: Aurora
Short Description: Fundamentals-based long-term electricity market simulation platform using transmission-constrained dispatch to generate nodal or zonal price forecasts, resource valuation, and policy scenario analysis.

Name: PlanOS
Short Description: Integrated system planning platform that unifies production cost (MAPS) and resource adequacy (MARS) modeling within a single workflow environment, supporting long-term planning, reliability assessment, and renewable integration studies, including capacity expansion analysis.
Primary Application: Integrated System Planning (Production Cost + Resource Adequacy)

Name: PROMOD
Short Description: Enterprise-grade wholesale electricity market simulation platform used for production cost modeling, transmission-constrained economic dispatch, and investment-grade scenario analysis across nodal and zonal markets.

Name: EnCompass
Short Description: Flexible power market forecasting and resource planning software combining full operational detail of power plants with the ability to relax constraints for long-term simulations. Evaluates new technologies while enforcing transmission limits and real-world operating costs.

Name: SERVM
Short Description: Resource adequacy and generation expansion modeling platform that simulates thousands of scenarios to evaluate reliability, renewable integration, and economically optimal resource plans under varying market and weather conditions.

Name: PROBE
Short Description: Advanced production cost and market simulation platform performing nodal, transmission-constrained dispatch to forecast energy prices, congestion, and locational marginal prices (LMPs) for generation and transmission investment analysis.

Name: DAYZER
Short Description: Specialized software for forecasting long-term and day-ahead locational market prices that analyzes price spikes, congestion, and bidding strategies for risk mitigation and strategic planning.

Name: BID3
Short Description: Strategic electricity market model simulating interconnected power systems across Europe with high temporal and spatial granularity. Optimizes generation dispatch and long-term investment decisions, capturing renewable integration, storage, and interconnector flows.
